strapiEvent.name: Vertical Succulent (Make & Take)
strapiEvent.location: Botanical Garden of the Ozarks - Fayetteville, AR
strapiEvent.description:
Bring your Valentine to a special make and take workshop celebrating love (and plants)! Each couple will enjoy refreshments while working together to create a lovely piece of living art to take home! 

Our Garden Designer, Lee Witty, will show you how fun and easy it is to make these heart themed succulent wall hangings, while Director of Philanthropy and Member Services, John Berry serves wine, sparkling water and beer accompanied by cheese, meats, and tasty sweets!

One ticket to this event covers the cost of refreshments and all materials necessary for two participants to collaborate on a single project. Space is limited.

$115/members or $130/nonmembers
